a.n: André Manoukian invite China Moses a Montlouis

p.k: French jazz musician André Manoukian, notably known for his role on the jury of the French version of Pop Idol, performs with bassist Christophe Wallemme and percussionist Stéphane Huchard at the 2013 Festival Jazz en Touraine.
p.d: French jazz musician André Manoukian, notably known for his role on the jury of the French version of Pop Idol, performs with bassist Christophe Wallemme and percussionist Stéphane Huchard at the 2013 Festival Jazz en Touraine. During the first half of this energetic concert, the trio accompanies saxophonist and Armenian duduk player Hervé Gourdikian. In the second part of the program, China Moses, daughter of jazz great Dee Dee Bridgewater, performs various classics of the jazz repertoire.
